body.description: DR.PERFECT EXTRA HARD HUGE HEAD TOOTHBRUSH This huge head toothbrush is the newest version for our hard toothbrush series . Its head length will be up to 4.5 cm and contains much more bristle in each hole . You will find it exactly the strongest hard toothbrush in the market and best choice for the heavy smokers . Best choice to CLEAN and WHITEN Your teeth if you have smoking or coffee stains problems .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made my Teeth Feal Smooth!
reviews.reviewText: Very Good Quality Toothbrush, works Very Well. Very Firm, makes your gums bleed a little until they get used to it. That only happened to me the 1st, 2 times. You definitely don't need to brush hard. I prefer these firm toothbrushes because they actually clean your teeth. Which is the whole point of brushing your teeth. Great Value for 4 of these toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Teeth have NEVER BEEN CLEANER
reviews.reviewText: Yes, the bristles are rough but it gets everything. My teeth feel so much cleaner and fresh now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these toothbrushes!
reviews.reviewText: If you want a hard toothbrush go with these! They are very firm, borderline stiff. They start to soften up a bit after about a month or two. The only thing is you have to really open the bristles up and thoroughly rinse in between every time you use, because the bristles are very tight and stuck together. Also because the brush is so firm be careful at first and watch your gums because you can easily scratch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had some trouble finding harder bristle tooth brushes locally so I decided to go to Amazon and was not disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ONLY TOOTHBRUSH I USE
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I found this brand. Started using these toothbrushes over a year ago and haven't looked back. I'm not a fan of soft bristle toothbrushes it feels like my mouth doesn't get clean. With these the bristles are hard and firm. They removed all that needs to be remove! Plus they last a very long time. The bristles doesn't wear out over time like most toothbrushes. I would say if you have sensitive teeth and gums this might be harsh for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This are the best toothbrushes we've used. At first they seem too hard BUT just be gentle around your gums and brush regularly with your teeth. My friend used them and I noticed how white his teeth were getting. I bought some and used them. I started getting people noticing how white my teeth are. My daughter started using them with her braces and same with her. My mom now uses them. A lot of people now use them because we all saw how it actually makes your teeth white.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are very firm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really, REAlly REALLY STIFF!!!
reviews.reviewText: Holy quacamole! There has to be something between the every-other wimpy-soft toothbrushes on the market and these. These cleaned my teeth better than I can remember, but watch out for your gums!! I will use on a rare occasion when I am tired of build-up from my under-performing but gum-friendly other toothbrushes (manual and electric), and use these in the fall to groom fleas from my cats, as the bristles are super stiff and plentiful.

reviews.reviewTitle: really good brush, let's see how long it stays firm and lasts
reviews.reviewText: Feels really firm against the teeth, teeth feel really clean and smooth after brushing...good product...so just an update, it's over a month now and the brush still has its shape and bristles are still firm...very happy with it...
Buena calidad de los cepillos , y tamaño grande !!! Es lo mejor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wife loves it so much better than the last one that we tried and that only lasted one brush well not even that if you read my other tooth brush review, these are much better but you do have to buy four of them.
